all_questions.question: What was the cause of the long delay during the live subtitling session?
all_questions.context: So one of the issues was indeed that there was some internet connectivity problem at the ASR partner and the whole pipeline was then slow and we didn't know.

all_questions.question: Why did the pre-test session run smoothly but not the live subtitling session?
all_questions.context: So we have run the like a pre-test session on the evening before that day and everything worked smoothly and when we were doing the live subtitling suddenly there was a long delay

all_questions.question: What is one challenge in diagnosing issues with the multi-party system?
all_questions.context: it's this way non-deterministic. So one day it works and another day it doesn't work because there are too many components involved

all_questions.question: Why is the architecture of the system considered complex?
all_questions.context: And this architecture is well complex and still we need to add proper diagnosis tools
